pullRequest.title: Adjust documentation regarding Elasticsearch setup
pullRequest.bodyText: This is a follow-up patch for PR #1288, which was merged prematurely.

nodes.bodyText:
This will not end up in any pre-9.x documentation anyway:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Since version 9.0, Opencast requires an external Elasticsearch instance. It needs to be started before Opencast.
          
          
            
            Opencast requires Elasticsearch.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -96,8 +96,14 @@ For testing, it is totally fine to keep the internal database, but you are highl
 database for productional use. For more information about database configuration, have a look at the [Database
 Configuration](database.md) section.
 
+Step 6: Elasticsearch Configuration
+-----------------------------------
 
-Step 6: Setting the Storage Directory (optional)
+Since version 9.0, Opencast requires an external Elasticsearch instance. It needs to be started before Opencast.

commit.message:
Adjust documentation regarding Elasticsearch setup

This is a follow-up patch for PR #1288, which was merged prematurely.
